name: py-pdoc3

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Auto-generate API documentation for Python projects.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-git
dependencies.description: Setuptools revision control system plugin for Git

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-mako
dependencies.description:
A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the
existing templating languages.

dependencies.name: py-markdown
dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.
